channel.title: Xcode on CAN
channel.description: Recent content in Xcode on CAN

item.title: Enabling Hidden Xcode Simulator Features
item.description: Apple has some nice little features for the simulator in Xcode to boost your productivity or improve your environment. However, unfortunately, even if they’re currently fully functional, they’re hidden away. And knowing Apple, they’ll most probably keep it that way. Although, that doesn’t mean these features were meant to stay hidden. You can enable them yourself. It used to be that only a single Terminal command of sudo mkdir /AppleInternal would enable it but as it has been commented out to me, it seems that Apple put some safe guards against this command.
